name: Javelin Weapon Calibration Radar
desc: An integrated Lidar in the Javelin-Class provides the required targeting for this warship in an alternative way, one that is not compatible with conventional systems. This ship's PD weapon range is increased by {%s}

name: Tugboat
desc: This ship can act as a tugboat. Increases the maximum speed of one of the slowest ships in the fleet to the same speed as this ship.

name: Type-28 Shield Generator
desc: A logically miscalculated gamma core adds a separate shield generator module to the hull, with a module size almost equal to the size of the destroyer giving it excellent shield efficiency at the cost of flux upkeep. No shield hullmods can be installed atop this modification.

name: Cruise Missile Carrier
desc: Is able to launch S-1 Cruise Missiles in the cargo hold offensively, once they are loaded.

name: Spin Module
desc: This ship's modules will rotate around the mothership at a certain speed

name: Module Orientation
desc: This module's weapon range is increased by {%s}

name: Controlled Shield
desc: The enhanced shield control system allows the targeting system to capture the trajectory of a long-range projectile, automatically its hardening the shields moments before impact. The larger the hull, the more distance is required for the system to function. For projectiles flying from {%s/%s/%s/%s} distance away, shields only take {%s} damage.

name: Hot-Autoloader System
desc: FSF designed an advanced reloading system that efficiently recycles unused weapon energy for reloading efforts, which accelerates reloading by {%s} when weapon ammunition is low. However, this unique autoloader framwork is incompatible with Extended Magazines.

name: Advanced Flux Dissipation System
desc:
Equips the ship with a discharge system optimized for soft amplitude characteristics. At zero hard flux, the ship gains an additional {%s} flux per second for every flux vent installed, but the effect is reduced as the amount of hard flux rises, and is removed entirely at maximum hard flux.

No bonus is provided when the ship does not have shields or has had them disabled.

name: High Flux Register
desc: The ship is equipped with special high voltage capacitors that can only operate at maximum capacity under heavy flux load. At zero flux, the ship's flux dissipation decreases by {%s} for flux capacitor, but the effect is reversed as the flux level rises, and increases by the same amount at when reaching maximum flux.

name: Line Matrix Targeting
desc: Installs a high performance ballistic radar to further increase weapon range, but the culmative stress on the grid reduces the efficiency of the shield system. Increases the ship's range by {%s/%s/%s/%s/%s} depending on the size of the ship, while shield efficiency is reduced.

name: Vanguard Hull
desc: Reinforces the hull against repeated attacks from small caliber weaponry, although of less effectiveness against larger caliber weapons. Not compatible with Reinforced Bulkheads.

name: Anchor Shield
desc: Unique shield system which continously produces soft flux when deployed. However, when attacked, if the current soft flux is higher than hard flux, it will preferentially convert the soft flux into hard flux instead of generating hard flux.

name: Cruise Missile
desc: Auto-tracking cruise missiles which cannot be manually controlled; detonates when close to enemy ships.

name: FSF Hull Design
desc: FSF hulls feature an internal open flux pipeline which allow for a large number of interfaces to allow for disruptive modifications to the ship and reduces the consequences of flux overload. When a ship produces soft flux in a short period of time, it enters a warm-up state, and remaining in the warm-up state generates additional flux gain based on the current hullmod. The amount of flux gained required to enter the warm-up state is determined by the capacity, and the rate at which the warm-up state fades is determined by the flux dispersion.

name: Missile Launch Platform
desc: An advanced missile factory occupies most of the ship's hull, allowing it to produce a steady stream of high-quality missiles at the expense of launch speed and capacity.

name: Multi-turret Optimization
desc: This ship has been built more efficiently in a way that allows it to withstand the weight of additional weapon mounts, and as such weapons mounted consume {%s/%s/%s} less OP for small, medium and large slots.
